name: Last Stand (itch)
description:
It's your last stand! The robots have surrounded you and you'll have to take out as many of them as you can with your infinite-ammo machine-gun pistol before they get to you!

Aim up or down with the up and down arrow keys, and shoot to either the left or right with the left and right arrow keys.

Made in 2 days for One Mechanic Game Jam 2

Might not detect key input when using Firefox : Recommended browser is Chrome

Also the game crashes when you play it for too long because I made this when learning to make JavaScript games and it's got spaghetti code.

Music by Kevin Macleod
